name: Deep Space Burrito
description:
Feed yourself well using the burrito dispenser and the microwave. Power the ship using the crank next to your bed. Stay alive, at all costs.

How to Play:

Simply move across the ship with your cursor and press the microwave or vending machine to use them. The burritos can be clicked and dragged along with the crank that generates energy for the ship.

There are two meters; hunger and ship power. The former can be found below the microwave and the latter is on the crank.

Have fun!!
